review.title: “Agent working for high end luxury rentals”
review.pros: Pros – Best reasons to work there were the flexibility to schedule your own hours and to network among owners and clients
review.cons: Cons – Not a large potential for growth, management is not willing to see the opportunities presented for growth in the new market.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – It would be beneficial to consider the growth opportunities for each agent and to assist in helping to encourage growth within the company
